website_summaries.verdict: Not the best choice for consumers with sensitive teeth or those who don't like grainy toothpaste; otherwise the pleasant flavor makes it worth considering for those who prefer spearmint.
pros: Stands out for the pleasant spearmint flavor that leaves a refreshing minty taste
Some users report results after about one week of use
cons: A few reports of tooth sensitivity when used frequently
Has a bit of a grainy consistency

customer_reviews.title: No More
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to be working great for awhile, I was one of those people who didn't quite take care of their teeth that great until now and I am 24, I seen great reviews and no issues. I am now noticing that parts of my teeth, mainly the front is starting to stain black... Seen no amazing whitening or anything else, also made my teeth more sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Smith

customer_reviews.title: After a few usages my teeth became very sensitive. ...
customer_reviews.text: After a few usages my teeth became very sensitive. Also didn't not whiten. Please do your research on charcoal toothpaste before you use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Hauburger

customer_reviews.title: Yay for Charcoal toothpaste!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy using the paste instead of the powder. It probably is more expensive, but the paste gives my mouth a fresher, cooler ending. And my teeth are kept as clean and as white as they could ever be! I started using charcoal toothpaste because Sensodyne was just not helping alleviate the problems with my sensitive gums. The charcoal toothpaste has been far more successful; and this paste is nice to use, too.
customer_reviews.author: Glo

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for two weeks and have noticed nothing. I read all positive reviews and figured I would try it. Waste of my money, sadly. I really wanted this to work!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Loooooved this and recommended it to everyone I know. Instantly whitened my teeth, I used it for about three days in a row when I first got it and then use it now for touch up whitening maybe once every 1-2 weeks. No pain with whitening, no sensitivity, super fast and easy. Great taste. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as minty as I’d like but it makes me use another toothpaste to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t say it made a huge difference but it definitely has kept some of the yellowing and plaque at bay. To clarify, in my experience, it didn’t purify anything, just prevented my frequent coffee cravings from yellowing my teeth. Made a subtle improvement but my bottom teeth are still not on the same level. The taste is ok. Not as minty as I’d like but it makes me use another toothpaste to get that minty taste thereby creating a more efficient cleaning process. Overall, not a regrettable purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Scary smile while brushing, but this stuff seems to work. Left my teeth noticeably brighter, possibly even a shade whiter after only one use. Careful when spitting the stuff out- leaves black toothpaste everywhere in a white sink, but totally worth it. Not sure this is pro-enamel...but dentist was ok with me using it once a day as long as I used “enamel safe” toothpaste the other times I brush.
customer_reviews.author: brewny

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't quite sure about this product but, after I tried it I am a believer! It's been about a week of regular use and I do see a difference in my teeth color. They are much whiter and I will definitely keep using it. As a busy working Mom of two this is about as much of a commitment I can make.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Glisson

customer_reviews.title: I struggled with really bad sensitivity in my teeth and this has almost completely ...
customer_reviews.text: I struggled with really bad sensitivity in my teeth and this has almost completely rid of it just after a couple of uses. I like the taste and my teeth are already whiter and I haven't even gotten half way throughout the tube yet!
customer_reviews.author: Natolie Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Hooked on the Results!
customer_reviews.text: Must give this a try! It took almost a tube before I noticed my teeth are substantially more white consistently. So don't give up or think it's not working after the first few uses or a week even! Use VERY LITTLE!! Wet your toothbrush first, the toothpaste is a little slippery on the brush. I'm hooked!
customer_reviews.author: VCrane

customer_reviews.title: A-
customer_reviews.text: I don't like to use other whitening toothpaste because of sensitive teeth, so I tried this. The taste kind of sucks, but they really do seem to make my teeth noticeably whiter after just one brush, so I use it every couple of days as just a whitener, and my other sensitive toothpaste on the rest.
customer_reviews.author: usaDiabeticTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: After a few days I could see a difference.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure about this whitener, after a few days of brushing my teeth I could see the difference. My husband who doesn't notice anything actually commented that my teeth looked whiter!! YES!!
customer_reviews.author: molsby

customer_reviews.title: I did still brush with other toothpaste in the AM to get rid of bad breath and to strengthen my teeth
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! I saw results within a few days of brushing. I did still brush with other toothpaste in the AM to get rid of bad breath and to strengthen my teeth, but this toothpaste is a great addition if you want quick whitening results.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the powder
customer_reviews.text: I tried the powdered kind and noticed a difference in the whiteness after one day! I bought the paste thinking it would be more convenient... it is more user friendly but I don't think it has quite the same whitening power for some reason. It's not as messy which I like, but I'd probably opt for the powder next time.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: No results
customer_reviews.text: This deffinetly does not work. I used for 2 weeks and noticed no changes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome my teeth and gums never looked so healthy even ...

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work don’t waste ya money. The brand is important and this isn’t the real one.

customer_reviews.title: Impressed mom
customer_reviews.text: I am SO IMPRESSED! This is like magic, after one brush my teeth look so much whiter. My 3 year old was also interested because he liked that it made my teeth black. So thats also a plus!

customer_reviews.title: Nothing Special
customer_reviews.text: So your toothpaste is black and you get to copy these kids you see on social media. Stick to crest, save your money.

customer_reviews.title: but I did like mixing this in with my morning routine
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how much of a difference I saw in my teeth, but I did like mixing this in with my morning routine. My teeth felt a little cleaner after using this toothpaste compared to my other stuff

customer_reviews.title: Good taste, cleans
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this for his toothpaste. It takes a little getting used to but cleans his teeth very well. He uses a water flosser afterwards to remove any residue. Not a bad taste either.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite toothpaste!
customer_reviews.text: I just started using this toothpaste. I love it! I bought it to share with my daughter to get her excited about brushing her teeth, and she loves it. It's just right and it make a my teeth feel smooth and clean like they do after I oil pull.

customer_reviews.title: Best toothpaste ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best toothpaste I have ever used. My teeth haven't looked and felt this good in years! Teeth still feel clean in the morning even if I didn't brush them the night before!

customer_reviews.title: taste great. Results eh
customer_reviews.text: taste is minty and not weird, but I haven't really noticed any results...I use it three times a week but maybe I should amp it up to daily. Just works like normal toothpaste.

customer_reviews.title: This product is great, from the first time i used it
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, from the first time i used it, you can tell the difference, it works wonders. Will order more!

customer_reviews.title: Overall satisfied with my purchase and will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Naturally whitens my teeth and they feel clean too. As with any charcoal toothpaste you do have to rinse more than you would a regular toothpaste. Overall satisfied with my purchase and will buy again.

customer_reviews.text: Don’t like the taste to much ..been using for a little time now .. teeth only have brighten some ..

customer_reviews.title: Best toothpaste EVER
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this after trying the regular paste and the powder. I personally love the powder, but my 8 year old gets it all over the place so we decided on the paste. Great product with an awesome flavor.

customer_reviews.title: they like it, getting used to the taste
customer_reviews.text: purchased for my kids , they like it , getting used to the taste , but they like the way their teeth feel after brushing

customer_reviews.text: I did not like the taste and I fill that for me it did not work

customer_reviews.title: I like it and definitely will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I like it and definitely will buy again. As it is natural product and not with harsh chemicals I did not expect results right away, but after 2 weeks I do see it. Friend of mine was using it for a moth and looks great. The only compliment is it is a bit runny which makes my sink messy and causes waste. As of reviews that say it stained toothbrush- I have white toothbrush, rise it after each use and don't see a problem.

customer_reviews.text: yes it does work and what I find after using it the my gums started to get stronger

customer_reviews.title: Whiter teeth after just 1 week!
customer_reviews.text: Was happy with this toothpaste. Flavor was not what I expected .it doesn't have a charcoal flavor at all. Even my picky teenagers are using it. The toothpaste arrived quickly!

customer_reviews.title: Best toothpaste I’ve ever tried
customer_reviews.text: This seriously is the best toothpaste I have ever used! I was surprised at how well it removes yellow stains on your teeth. It also cleans your teeth SO well! It feels like you got a cleaning from the dentists office every time you brush. If you are having a difficult decision on which toothpaste to get, DEFINITELY get this one!

customer_reviews.text: Didn't like brushing teeth with black toothpaste...black spattered all over, I know it was a visual thing, but couldn't get past that.

customer_reviews.text: Not what was expected. Have had other charcoal toothpaste--this one is like INK in your mouth. I would not buy again.

customer_reviews.text: I noticed a different color of my teeth after the first brush will be buying again

customer_reviews.title: Charcoal is the way to go!

customer_reviews.title: Texture and flavor is better than standard toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: Noticed a difference in color after the first few uses, but nothing after that. Didn't whiten as much as expected, maybe just a shade or two. Texture and flavor is better than standard toothpaste. (I waited until the whole tube was used to give a review)

customer_reviews.title: nothing like a paste but more of a gel
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this product one star for the following reason. The toothpaste was very runny, nothing like a paste but more of a gel. When applying it on the brush it runs off . As for the results of its whitening capabilities, the verdict remains unknown.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!

customer_reviews.text: The toothpaste has a nice mild peppermint flavor and scent. I floss, tongue scrape, and use mouthwash in addition to using this and sometimes I feel like my breath isn't as fresh as with other toothpastes. Other than that it's great.

customer_reviews.title: ... gum really healthy I can see the difference I love this toothpaste will recommend to

customer_reviews.text: It's nice and tastes okay. Texture though is very loose . Dunno if this is how it should be.

customer_reviews.text: Love the product !! I was skeptical of trying the charcoal toothpaste---- but it does work !! Will buy more

customer_reviews.title: It made my teeth feel very clean.
customer_reviews.text: It made my teeth feel very clean. It has kind of a sweet taste. The black color made it fun to use. I actually got my daughter to brush her teeth 3 times in the first day I received it.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stained Teeth
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste looks like thick, black swamp water but I didn't care if it did it's job. Then after a few days I started noticing that my teeth looked grey so I cleaned my toothbrush really good and brushed with baking soda and was I ever shocked! My teeth were actually stained from the black tooth stuff. It took a while for the charcoal color to stop coming off my teeth. That's my personal experience and I'll never use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Just got it. Box was completely crushed. The ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got it. Box was completely crushed. The spearmint smell is very strong and I haven't broken the seal yet. Will update once I've started using it. *Update* mint taste isn't as strong as I thought it would be so that's great. I've seen more of an improvement on my husband's teeth than mine. Definitely buying again and again
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Fullington

customer_reviews.title: Seems good but definitely tastes worse than a traditional toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: First time using a natural toothpaste. Seems good but definitely tastes worse than a traditional toothpaste. I'm sure it's probably healthier though and using black toothpaste is a fun novelty. Giving 4 stars just because I can't tell if there's really a benefit over regular toothpaste but it definitely works just as well
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would take longer but just after three uses it did wonders for my teeth, but i also bought the activated teeth whitening charcoal powder with mine and charcoal toothbrushes. My husband loves this product as well. Just after three uses people even commented on noticing my teeth were whiter!
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! My teeth felt different after the very first use. They were smooth and had that just polished by the dentist look to them and I swear they looked whiter! I also love the fact that it is safe and free of harmful ingredients that can be found in other toothpastes!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: This is truly my favorite product ever
customer_reviews.text: This is truly my favorite product ever! 1. it works wonders! really it makes a noticable change within the first use! 2. the taste is not bad at all, taste better than colgate toothpaste to me 3. the smell is a soft minty scent which also helps because sometimes when its too strong its hard to brush for the exact couple mins. I love this toothpaste! will definitely recommend and order again!

customer_reviews.text: Great paste for the kids,I like the powder better but kids make a mess with it. So this is a perfect alternative.

UPDATE: I've been using this product for a week or so now, and I have noticed that my teeth are becoming more white with time, which is fantastic! The company has great customer service and reached out to me as well, thanks for that!! It cleans the teeth very well, just make sure to floss afterwards to get the toothpaste out of between your teeth(;

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and kind of made my teeth a little whiter...

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely purchase again.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: These didn't fit the thermal cup. Disappointed, I need to return it because I came use cup with these replacement
customer_reviews.author: Bernice Calderon

customer_reviews.title: Great whitener, but leaves a residue between your teeth
customer_reviews.text: Leaves your teeth feeling clean and is very effective as a whitener. Maybe it's the placebo effect, but I swear I could tell a difference after just a couple of uses. However, it's difficult to get the black residue of the toothpaste completely out from between your teeth even with flossing and rinsing, so I would recommend using this product right before bed and then a "regular" toothpaste in the morning so your teeth won't look like they're starting to rot when you're out in public during the day. It might frighten people. ;) Plus, using it once a day will make it last longer! Definitely recommend buying it, though! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: ShelbyJ

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: Taste is great! Makes your mouth feel minty clean! Make sure to clean the sink soon after you brush. Don't leave it to wipe up later. I learned that lesson the hard way when I was in a rush and my sink was stained. My teeth don't look more white to me however the clean feeling I get will keep me coming back for more.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: The real deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only brand of charcoal toothpaste I will ever buy. I’ve tried so very many different brands of charcoal toothpaste and this is, BY FAR, the best there is! Has a wonderful flavor, I’ve tried both flavors and they are equally as good, and doesn’t leave a funky aftertaste in your mouth like most other toothpastes. You can eat/drink right after you brush and it won’t affect the taste of your food/drink. Whitens very quickly as well! My husband and I both saw results within a week!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Time and patience and I LOVE
customer_reviews.text: This toothpaste is great! Has a light flavor and works well! Leave it on for a few minutes before brushing and rinsing. You will see results in a few week's time. I'd be scared if my teeth were whitened immediately afterward! That would be terrifying, lol! So, give it time, give it a half a bottle and you'll see results.
customer_reviews.author: Kristiannarae

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this toothpaste
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this toothpaste. I expected the black mess that it makes, but what I do not like is that it's not like a paste or a gel. It's too runny which contributes to an even bigger black mess. I am using it anyway, but I see absolutely no change in the color of my teeth. No whitening. I won't buy it again.Maybe I'll try the charcoal powder next time.
customer_reviews.author: NorCal707

customer_reviews.title: I’m pregnant and this was perfect for me to brush my teeth with smells and ...
customer_reviews.text: It really whitens your teeth with continued use! Slight taste of mint, but no charcoal taste at all. I’m pregnant and this was perfect for me to brush my teeth with smells and taste.

The flavor is fine and it’s not as gritty feeling as plain activates charcoal. It did arrive a little squished, but there was no leaking and the seal on the tube was just fine.

I was pleased until i realized i had to be careful not to wet the powder or get moisture in the jar. These are reasons that i looooove this toothpaste. It also seems alot stronger than the dry powder.

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for a toothpaste with a great taste especially if you ar sensitive to mainstream brands

customer_reviews.text: Messy and doesn't seem to whiten at all. Doesn't freshen breath so I have to use my regular toothpaste right after. Will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Caralyn

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Just trying this out. So far I really like it. Seller wrote to check in and make sure I got my product.
customer_reviews.author: Denise A. Janzen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for 4 days now & it is working & does not make my teeth sensitive!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stuff. It was obvious that it had whitened my teeth after the first use. It tastes good too! I will definitely order more and continue to tell my friends about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

product_meta.title: Whitening Toothpaste with Activated Charcoal for Teeth and Gums (Refreshing Spearmint) - Safe on Enamel, Detoxifying, Plant-based and Cruelty Free
feature_bullets: SAFE & NATURAL STAIN REMOVAL: Low abrasion/RDA Index 132. An effective alternative treatment to harsh teeth whitening kits and strips, our Whitening Toothpaste with Activated Charcoal gives you whiter teeth without toxic ingredients, fluoride or bleach. Our Toothpaste safely cleans and polishes teeth, strengthens enamel, improves gum health and freshens breath. Remove coffee, tea, wine, and tobacco stains the natural way!

PLANT BASED INGREDIENTS: Vegan and vegetarian-friendly, our non-GMO charcoal teeth whitening Toothpaste contains no fluoride, gluten, microbeads, artificial flavors or colors. Our products are crafted using natural, plant-based and/or organic ingredients and never include harsh chemicals. Our Toothpaste is certified cruelty-free by the Leaping Bunny Program.

GENTLE FOR SENSITIVE TEETH: Moms, dads and kids rejoice! Our effective, cavity-fighting stain remover is made to naturally detoxify and can safely be used by your entire family, including your toddler. So whether you have braces, veneers or are experiencing tooth sensitivity, our Whitening Toothpaste with Activated Charcoal is perfect for kids and adults alike.

CLEAN & COOL MINT FLAVORS: Naturally freshening your breath as it cleans your teeth, our Whitening Toothpaste with Activated Charcoal is available in two clean and cool flavors for complete oral hygiene. Choose Refreshing Spearmint or Cool Peppermint for fresh breath you’ll love. Or why not try them both?

MADE IN USA: Our detoxifying Whitening Toothpaste is the only natural activated carbon/charcoal Toothpaste to be made, packaged, and shipped in the USA. Each tube will provide natural teeth cleaning and whitening for up to three months -- that’s long-lasting freshness for your teeth and gums!
